newsitem.title: SWEDEN: Ericsson hits new high on back of Nokia.
newsitem.headline: Ericsson hits new high on back of Nokia.

text.p: Swedish telecoms giant Ericsson rose over three percent to a new high on Thursday on the back of Finnish rival Nokia's nine-month results.
At 1400 GMT Ericsson was eight crowns higher at 201 crowns, a new high for the stock.
"This was mainly due to the strong report from Nokia," one broker told Reuters.
"But interest in telecoms has been quite strong lately, particularly compared to other industrials, and Ericsson has good numbers and good growth."
Nokia posted a pre-tax profit of 2,228 million markka from 3,984 million a year ago which was in line with analysts' forecasts.
